Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLExecutor<S,B,PQ extends SQLPreparedQuery<B>,RC extends SQLResultCollector>

Type Parameters:
S - Type of Vertx SQL client
B - Type of Vertx SQL bind value holder
PQ - Type of SQL prepare query
RC - Type of SQL result set collector
All Superinterfaces:
JooqDSLProvider, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLBlockExecutor, SQLDDLExecutor, SQLPlainExecutor, SQLQueryExecutor, SQLRoutineExecutor
All Known Subinterfaces:
Jooqx, JooqxBase<S>, JooqxConn, JooqxSession, JooqxTx, LegacyInternal<S>, LegacyJooqx, LegacyJooqxSession, LegacyJooqxTx
public interface SQLExecutor<S,B,PQ extends SQLPreparedQuery<B>,RC extends SQLResultCollector> extends SQLQueryExecutor, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLBlockExecutor, SQLDDLExecutor, SQLRoutineExecutor, SQLPlainExecutor
Represents for an executor that executes jOOQ query on Vertx SQL client connection
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • JooqDSLProvider
  • SQLBatchExecutor
  • SQLDDLExecutor
  • SQLPlainExecutor
  • SQLQueryExecutor
  • SQLRoutineExecutor
